plot: After the death of his father, a young military wants to sell his lands and properties, but the beautiful maid convince him to keep it and work the land.
title: Amor de una vida
plot_es: After the death of his father, a young military wants to sell his lands and properties, but the beautiful maid convince him to keep it and work the land.
plot_en: After the death of his father, a young military wants to sell his lands and properties, but the beautiful maid convince him to keep it and work the land.
